title: Would you hug?
body:
https://scontent.cdninstagram.com/t51.2885-15/s640x640/sh0.08/e35/12328447_564376617062848_245879966_n.jpg?ig_cache_key=MTIwMzQyMTU0NTEwMDkwMDY3Nw%3D%3D.2

even if you would most likely suffer extreme physical pain in doing so?

replies.body: Nah not really. Seeing as that would be assault on someone without consent. And i respect peoples rights for me not to use physical contact.

note, this is not an argument. an argument is something where both sides have something to learn, and willfully give points to the other side in an effort to better the self and to better the other. this is more akin to someone whining about what they believe without considering the truth that is apparent on the other side.


all people hold a fragment of truth, it is in your best interest to procure as many of those as you can.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xscB27mE,comment-id=000b00000000000000000001,timestamp=2016-03-15T05:06:36.359+0000)
>
> note, this is not an argument. an argument is something where both sides have something to learn, and willfully give points to the other side in an effort to better the self and to better the other. this is more akin to someone whining about what they believe without considering the truth that is apparent on the other side.
> 
> 
> all people hold a fragment of truth, it is in your best interest to procure as many of those as you can.

Yeah man there's ton of truth to be held in an anime weeaboo picture of shyvanna. Man you people are hilarious. This is what happens when one person decides to share their opinion and not become a sheep. You should try it sometime.

there is so much to learn in this world, yet you brush aside the beginning without thought due to a misreading of my words.

I am not saying that the shyvana picture has a fragment of truth. I am saying EVERYTHING has a fragment of truth. all words spoken, written, all paintings and all music. every line of every song, holds just a small fragment towards the truth. the truth can and is different, depending on what you seek, so not all things hold the truth you seek, yet all of the truths hold fast. 

In this case, the truth that is shared by the picture of shyv can mean a lot of things, if you don't get it, then i can't help you, it's a puzzle and you only have one out of a million pieces, i couldn't even begin to explain where it needs to go.

the truth that i wanted you to glean information from, however, was from the replies you have received.


instead of being defensive and stand offish, learn from the words of others, and embrace the truth of yourself that they entail, and use them to become a better person than you are now.

You sexy soap turtle. Good man right here.

Yes*

I wouldn't

I would give Shyvanna 100% of a hug, but she will only be able to give me 50% of a hug because of her nerfs, and I don't wanna hug someone who doesn't put as much effort in hugging as me.
{{champion:59}} Might have a couple words with us...

Demacia, now and forever. For the king!

That's about all the words I ever hear him say.

Should be more of Fallout 4's dialogue wheel:

1. Yes.
2. Yes, but in a moment.
3. Hug? Yes.
4. Sarcastic yes.
And the sarcastic yes turns out to be meaner than you were expecting >_<
But then you get gems like "Igor, fetch me the brain!"

Hell no. That is a straight-up dragon woman. It's _almost_ never a good idea to fuck with something that **CAN BURN YOU ALIVE.**

Would **YOU** want to try this? **FUCK NO.**

**DO YOU KNOW HOW MANY DRAGON-WOMAN RELATED DEATHS OCCUR A DAY?**   ~~Surprisingly few~~

She isn't even wearing **PANTS** for fucks sake! That should be the biggest "Nope"" you can find!

worth, hugged dragon bae.

also would prefer her to not be wearing pants.

"~~Surprisingly few~~"

I laughed :P
look closer and you'll see she is wearing pants
Not in any practical sense :P

Hug the girl!

Caress the girl!

FUCK.THE.GIRL!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
This post makes me feel uncomfortable
I would fuck.

Hugging requires touching.

I don't touch, unless I kill.

So....... No.
touching directly while killing means you're doing it wrong. one graceful cut is all it takes.

Nah.
I like the feel of crushing bones with my own hands.
Or making pretzels out of spines.

of course breaking bones sound cool, but nothing is more wonderful than watching your victim claw at their intestines as they fall to the floor. such a myriad of reds, it's like art almost. all broken bones will do is ruin their desire to run, but why not let them run, it's a futile act anyway.

A few dislocated joints and a bit of internal hemorrhaging can achieve similar results.

*(I'm amazed at how *tame* the google results were for bone art.)*

all of that stuff happens on the inside, where no one can see it, and you miss out on the horror on their face when they realize, yes, that is your blood. and if you're unlucky you end up with nerve damage and make it so that they just lose feeling.

That's the point. It's not about what you see; it's about what you *feel*. It's the tactile response you get only when you act with your own two hands. No fancy tools.

And if you're wanting to watch someone claw at their insides and/or crawl away in futility: then watch the agony that comes from a ruptured spleen, or walking attempts when a leg is bent backwards.

when it comes to feeling, the best feeling for my tastes is when i've had my fun and am about to give mercy, I knock them over and then crush their pitiful skull with my boot. the crunch of it shattering is pretty satisfying. 

and besides, if i use my fists it is that much more likely that i am going to fail, and my brutish technique will be wasted in a pointless struggle that i could have ended mush easier if i was simply wielding the blade that i like.
The blade is a crutch. If you are doing it right, you are just as likely to fail with bare hands as with a blade. Except your hands are a *little* bit harder to lose.

a little less likely to fail with the blade, reach my friend. and yes, a blade can be hard to keep o hold of, if you are inexperienced, for me, it's like an extension of the self. an extra part of my arm that happens to be very sharp and easier to clean.
